statements: DELETE FROM medical_devices_data WHERE measurement_type = 'Blood Pressure'
DELETE FROM medical_devices_data WHERE device_id = 101 AND patient_id = 201;
DELETE FROM medical_devices_data WHERE measurement_type = 'blood_pressure' AND value > 120;
DELETE FROM device_info WHERE device_type = 'Wearable' AND manufacturer = 'Fitbit';
DELETE FROM patient_data WHERE patient_id = 1001 OR patient_id = 1002 AND timestamp > '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM device_data WHERE heart_rate < 60 AND blood_pressure = 'Normal';
